name: Travel as local people!
description: Danang, which is considered as one of the most worth-living cities in Vietnam, is located in the centre of VN. Here we have sea, mountains, forests and rivers,... alltogether make Danang become a unique place for visitors. There are some typical places that you should visit, if not you likely have never been to Danang, such as the Beach, Son Tra Peninsula, Marble Mountain, Bridges, Museums,... Further more, you can go to Hai Van Pass which is the connection between Danang and Hue, it has a beautiful high view of the mountain and sea, or, you can also go to Hoian which is known for its well-preserved Ancient Town, they all around Danang.
